title: Johnson & Johnson Cuts Production, Ends Contracts For Not So Successful COVID-19 Shot - Johnson & Johnson  ( NYSE:JNJ )
summary: Johnson & Johnson JNJ has significantly scaled back its efforts of manufacturing its COVID-19 vaccine after facing a fall in demand. The FDA approved the single-dose shot in February 2021 as it carried fewer cold-chain storage requirements than other shots. J&J's initial supply was small.
